EmailTemplate.name: EM-2017-05-19-Cramer-Cubs.EM-2017-05-19-Cramer
EmailTemplate.subject: {{lead.First Name:default=}}, hoping to connect at the June 6 CIO Summit
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=Friend}},
I'll be at the Chicago HMG Strategy CIO Summit on June 6, and was hoping we could connect for a minute or two so I can share a bit about Turbonomic and how we've helped enterprises like JPMC, Apple, Travelport, Barclays and Cisco transform their service delivery.
Additionally Turbonomic will have a box at the June 8 Cubs game against the Rockies, where customer executives from Morningstar will join us to share their experience of Turbonomic. Can we plan to connect on the 6th? I promise I'll be very respectful of your time.
Many thanks, Josh Cramer
Enterprise Account Executive, Turbonomic C: 312.927.2493
